snippet: Pittsburgh Steelers wide receiver Martavis Bryant is facing a one-year suspension from the N.F.L. for violating the league’s substance-abuse policy for the second time.
abstract: Pittsburgh Steelers wide receiver Martavis Bryant faces one-year suspension for violating NFL's substance-abuse policy for second time.
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh Steelers wide receiver Martavis Bryant is facing a one-year suspension from the N.F.L. for violating the league’s substance-abuse policy for the second time.

headline.main: Steelers’ Martavis Bryant May Be Suspended
